response.overview: Eriko went to Tokyo with the dream of becoming an actress, but it didn't go well, so she decided to return to the countryside. The day before, on the way back from a farewell party held by friends, he was talked to by office worker Naoya, who was drinking alone after being dumped by his lover, Kumiko. At first, Eriko was wary and immediately ran away, but he chased after Eriko with a bouquet of flowers she had forgotten, so the two talked drunkenly in the park, and when they got along, they went straight to the hotel. The compatibility of the body was also good, and it was just a fateful encounter.  The next morning, Naoya, who overslept, hurriedly asked Eriko for her phone number. Eriko gave her home number, but didn't say that she would be moving today. Work settled down, and Naoya called Eriko, but couldn't get through. He thought he had been given a fake phone number.
response.title: 熱い肉体、濡れた一夜
